title: Whole-grain griddle cakes with fruit and yoghurt
ingredients: ['140g (5 oz) wholemeal flour', '20g (3/4 oz) rolled oats', '1 tbsp wheatgerm, preferably toasted', '2 tbsp soft light brown sugar', '2 tsp baking powder', '225ml (8 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '300g (10 1/2 oz) plain low-fat yoghurt', '2 egg whites', '225g (8 oz) raspberries or blueberries']
